Text.Comment: &Also remove the files from the Database

Text.Text: Jeste li sigurni da želite pretvoriti oznaèeni svezak u drugi format\nIzvorne datoteke æe biti premještene u Koš za recikliranje nakon izvršene promjene formata\nPobrinite se za dostatan prostor na disku!
Text.Comment: Are you sure you want to convert the selected eComics?\nThe original files will be moved to the Recycle Bin after conversion. Please make sure there is enough disk space available!

Text.Text: Jeste li sigurni da želite premjestiti sveske u Košaru za recikliranje?
Text.Comment: Are you sure you want to move these books to the recycle bin?

Text.Text: Jeste li sigurni da želite ukloniti sveske iz popisa?
Text.Comment: Are you sure you want to remove these books from the list?

Text.Text: Želite li zaista ukloniti vezu na omiljene foldere?
Text.Comment: Do you really want to remove this Favorite Folder link?

Text.Text: Jeste li sugurni da želite ukloniti ove sveske iz biblioteke?\nSve informacije koje nisu zabilježene u datoteke æe se izgubiti (Zadnjeproèitani svezak, itd.)!
Text.Comment: Are you sure you want to remove these books from the library?\nAll information not stored in the files will be lost (like Open Count, Last Read etc.)!
Do you really want to remove this item?

Text.Text: Dateotek se još nadopunjuju u pozadini. Ako zatvorite program sada, neke informacije neæe biti zabilježene!
Text.Comment: Files are still being updated/converted in the background. If you close now, some information will not be written to the eComics!

Text.Text: Ne da se snimiti slika stranice!\nRazlog: {0}
Text.Comment: Could not save the page image!\nReason: {0}

Text.Text: Pojavio se je problem pri otvaranju baze podataka stripova. Nova prazna baza podataka je napravljena!
Text.Comment: There was a problem opening the Comic Database. A new empty Database has been created.

Text.Text: Pojavio se je probem s bazom podataka stripova. Ponovno je uspostavljena zadnja poznata verzija. Moguæe je da su neke stavke izgubljene.
Text.Comment: There was a problem with the Comic Database. The last version to be known good has been restored. You may have lost some entires.

Text.Text: Pojavila se je greška u spuštanju aplikacije ComicRack :\n{0}
Text.Comment: There was an error shutting down the application:\n{0}

Text.Text: Neke sveske se ne dadu izbrisati (možda se upravo èitaju)!
Text.Comment: Some books could not be deleted (maybe they are in use)!

Text.Text: Neuspješan dohvat baze podataka s poslužitelja!
Text.Comment: Failed to retrieve the Database from the Server!

Text.Text: ComicRack se ne da pokrenuti. Razlog: {0}

Text.Comment: Retrieving the shared Library from the Server

Text.Text: Dohvaæanje svih svezaka iz oznaèenog folera
Text.Comment: Retrieving all eComics from the selected folder

Text.Text: &Datoteke se takoðer sele u Koš za recikliranje
Text.Comment: &Also move the files to the Recycle Bin

Text.Text: Potrebna je lozinka za udeljenu biblioteku '{0}':
Text.Comment: A password is needed for the remote Library '{0}':

Text.Text: Svi podaci se spremaju na disk...
Podaci se bilježe u oznaèenu svesku
Upisana lozinka za ulaz u biblioteku'{0}' nije ispravna. Pokušajte ponovno:
Text.Comment: The specified password for the Library'{0}' is not correct. Please try again:

Text.Text: Stripovi u ovom folderu i svim njegovim podfolderima æe biti dodani u biblioteku.
Text.Comment: eComics in this Folder and all sub Folders will be added to the library.

Text.Text: Jeste li sigurni da želite sve popise gledati kao trenutni popis?
Text.Comment: Are you sure you want to set all Lists to the current layout?
